meanings.definition: Gymnastic exercises to achieve bodily fitness and grace of movement.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy doing calisthenics in the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: She improved her strength through regular calisthenics.
meanings.sent3: The clown entertained the audience by performing calisthenics in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Her fluid movements during the dance resembled the grace of calisthenics.
meanings.sent5: The calisthenics routine made her feel more agile and flexible.

meanings.sent1: Calisthenics is a great way to stay active without any equipment.
meanings.sent2: He dedicated himself to the daily practice of calisthenics.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends decided to start a calisthenics club for fun.
meanings.sent4: The discipline of calisthenics helped him build a routine in his life.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of calisthenics made it accessible to everyone.
